class_notes: Prerequisite of EPI 530 or EPI 504. Priority Registration for EPI/GLEPI students and those pursuing GME certificates until October 30th.
course_description: Prerequisite: EPI 530.  Introduces the basic concepts and premises of the systematic reviews and meta-analysis of epidemiologic studies.
schedule_location: M 1pm-2:50pm in R. Randall Rollins Bldg. R100
